title: MT41036: Stochastic Modelling Of Materials - Quick Facts
text:
MT41036
Course name | Stochastic Modelling Of Materials
Offered by | Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite - NilProbability and Distributions, Introduction to Stochastic Processes, Markov Chains, Markov Processes with Discrete and Continuous State Space, Renewal Processes and Theory, Stochastic Models for diffusion, defects and their transport, evolution of mesoscopic structures like grains and cracks, transport properties of materials.Text Books:1.J. Medhi : Stochastic Processes, New Age International Limited, New Delhi, 2nd Ed., 2004.2.S. Yip (Ed.): Handbook of Materials Modeling, Springer, 2005.
